text: Up the Academy is a 1980 American teen comedy movie directed by Robert Downey, Sr. and starring Ron Leibman, Ralph Macchio, Ian Wolfe, Tom Poston, Antonio Fargas, Barbara Bach. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:Movies set in boarding schools Category:Movies set in Kansas
title: Up the Academy
